A Catchy Title Tom Writes Stuff

First Post

06 Jan 2015

This is my first post. I'm mostly going to be talking about programming (I like Clojure), doing programming challenges, and little sysadmin tricks I pick up along the way at work and during administration of my VirtualBox setup at home.

I'm a software developer at Paychex in frigid Rochester, NY. I work in a whole bunch of technologies, including C, Java, and .NET, on different environments. I work mostly in the back end on our moving transmission infrastructure.
